caption.text:
Working on some simple Volume VOP recipes for my @sidefx #houdini talk at the @touchdesigner summit 2019 in #Montreal 
This is a simple Volume VOP exclusion summing two noises, being meshed, and being booled with a stack of planes. My goal for the talk is to leave yâ€™all with three hours that take you through an entire Houdini-based motion graphics toolkit - imagine if the core volume shape was a logo, running inside your toe. 
#graphics #realtime #3d #motiongraphics #motiondesign #vfx #digital #visuals
